1.0.1.name: wordpress/wp-export-all-post-information-excel-format
1.0.1.description: WP Export is a plugin to get all your blog's published and draft post data in Excel format as output. The post data means, post Title, Description, Excerpt, Categories, Tags and all other custom fields which you have used for your blog post. You can also makes changes in it and and save as CSV (Comma Delimited) format. Now you can use this CSV file to import this data wherever you want. What ever data you have inserted in you CSV file will be inserted to your blog with necessary category and tags. In case if any category is not already created in the blog, the plugin will add new category and post will be automatically assigned to it. So you don't worry about creating category and all. Even via CSV you can insert all basic post information with post custom fields and images. You need to insert image name only. Image will be assigned to related folder in wp-content/uploads folder as per wordpress upload format. You can see the post images while editing the inserted post, from post
